name: Chopper X-1
overview: As Commander of the Spectrum Chopper X-1 Gunship your task is to attack and destroy the invading aliens. Use your Missiles and Smart Bombs to counter the waves of SPINAD, SPORE and FUSA. If they reach Earth before being destroyed, then watch out for sudden attack from the rear! Controls: Helicopter Gunship Up - 7 Gunship Down - 6 Missile Fire - 0 Smart Bomb - 9 Most leading makes of Joystick can be used. N.B. Joystick left fires Smart Bomb.
